name: Jayesh Yadav
title: Data & AI Engineer
tagline: Building AI systems that automate what shouldn't be manual, solving the real pain points

experience.subtitle: AI-Powered Reconciliation & Finance Automation
experience.headline: AI Engineer Builds Reconciliation Engine Processing 1M+ Transactions Daily

projects.name: VC Fund Reconciliation Engine
projects.headline: Zero False Positives Across 10,000+ Transactions
projects.description: End-to-end document processing for capital call PDFs and bank statements with 100% accuracy. Docling-first + LLM fallback architecture reducing processing costs by 70% while maintaining zero false positives across 10,000+ daily transactions.

projects.name: Browser-to-API Platform
projects.headline: 30+ Vendors Connected, 1M+ Daily Transactions
projects.description: Proprietary engine converting web portals into programmable APIs with auto-generated Python SDKs. Email ingestion agent for vendor settlement data extraction. Onboarding reduced from 2 weeks to 2 days.

projects.name: Data Fabric & Self-Healing Pipelines
projects.headline: AI Agent Auto-Resolves Schema Drift
projects.description: Zero-code onboarding with auto-generated parsers and sandbox testing. AI Agent detects schema drift, self-heals pipelines, and sends root-cause alerts. Targeting 95% auto-resolution with zero developer dependency.
impact: Zero developer dependency for rule changes

projects.name: Email Ingestion Agent
projects.headline: Settlement Data Extracted from Vendor Emails Automatically
projects.description: Intelligent email parsing agent that automatically extracts settlement data from vendor communications, eliminating manual data entry and reducing processing errors to near-zero.

projects.name: CellView
projects.headline: Automated Battery Analytics Platform
projects.description: Full-stack battery analytics with automated data pipelines from cyclers, LLM-powered no-code dashboard, AutoML module. Adopted by 3 departments, processing 500K+ data points daily.

projects.name: SOH Prediction Model
projects.headline: EV Insurance Innovation
projects.description: Battery health prediction model enabling insurance companies to replace engine-based premium calculations with data-driven assessments across 1,200+ vehicles.

projects.name: Battery Pack Viability
projects.headline: Manufacturing Optimization
projects.description: Meta-model predicting pack pass/fail before assembly, reducing rework by 35% and cutting analysis time from 8 hours to 15 minutes.

experience.subtitle: Data Analytics Consulting

projects.name: Client Data Integrity Overhaul
projects.headline: Data Integrity Elevated from 72% to 96%
projects.description: Identified and rectified 15,000+ data inconsistencies across 3 client datasets, raising data integrity from 72% to 96%. Built validation frameworks ensuring ongoing accuracy.

projects.name: Automated Reporting Pipeline
projects.headline: Reporting Turnaround: 5 Days to 1 Day
projects.description: Built automated pipelines in Python and SQL that replaced manual reporting workflows, reducing turnaround from 5 days to 1 day and influencing $2M+ in business decisions.
